data.text: @cyrusshahpar46 It should really be at this point up to the individual if they feel I’ll or not to keep masking.

@cyrusshahpar46 You know what, I’ve defended the @CDCgov since day one and followed their advice.

No longer trust.

I’ll wear my mask, socially distance, and other mitigation.

This is wrong. They are appeasing the minority. This will absolutely end our already ended HCWers, destroy HC.
@KaooavopaKatapa @cyrusshahpar46 Right! Let's keep face masks on forever because you never know if "new variant"! Reasonable. Make absolute sense.

@cyrusshahpar46 Appreciate you Cyrus, but we've been here before, before Delta, and it was wrong then, and it's likely wrong now. Real world just isn't conducive to abstract terminology like "healthy" and tends toward ableism.
